# 0 — Configuration

```{r config}
VINTAGE <- "2019"
YR1 <- 1999; YR2 <- 2009; YR3 <- 2019; YR4 <- 2029

CSV_PATH <- file.path(path.expand("~"), "Documents", "SHRS_Analysis",
                       "market_analysis", "v3data", "projections_csv",
                       "labor_force_csv", "2019",
                       "2019_labor-force - Table 3.3.csv")
```

# 1 — Load & Clean

```{r load}
raw <- read_csv(CSV_PATH, skip = 2, col_names = FALSE, show_col_types = FALSE)

names(raw) <- c("group",
                "rate_yr1","rate_yr2","rate_yr3","rate_yr4",
                "rate_chg_12","rate_chg_23","rate_chg_34",
                "cagr_12","cagr_23","cagr_34")

clean_num <- function(x) {
  x <- str_remove_all(as.character(x), ",")
  x <- str_trim(x)
  x[x %in% c("\u2014","\u2013","—","-","NA","",".")] <- NA
  suppressWarnings(as.numeric(x))
}

raw <- raw |>
  mutate(group = str_trim(as.character(group))) |>
  filter(!is.na(group), group != "", !str_detect(group, "^Footnote|^Note:|^Source:|^\\[|^\\(")) |>
  mutate(across(-group, clean_num)) |>
  filter(!is.na(rate_yr3))
```

```{r dq, results='asis'}
cat(paste0("**Vintage:** ",VINTAGE," | **Rows:** ",nrow(raw),"\n"))
```

# 2 — Overall LFPR Trend

```{r total}
total <- raw |> filter(str_detect(group, "^Total"))

lfpr_current <- total$rate_yr3
lfpr_projected <- total$rate_yr4
lfpr_change <- total$rate_chg_34

tibble(Year=c(YR1,YR2,YR3,YR4),
       Rate=c(total$rate_yr1,total$rate_yr2,total$rate_yr3,total$rate_yr4),
       Type=c("Historical","Historical","Current","Projected")) |>
  ggplot(aes(x=Year, y=Rate)) +
  geom_line(linewidth=1.2, color="gray60") +
  geom_point(aes(fill=Type), shape=21, size=5, color="white", stroke=1.5) +
  geom_text(aes(label=paste0(Rate,"%")), vjust=-1.2, size=4) +
  scale_fill_manual(values=c("Historical"="#2c7bb6","Current"="#27ae60","Projected"="#f39c12")) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits=c(57,70)) +
  labs(title=paste0("LFPR Trend (",VINTAGE,")"), x=NULL, y="Rate (%)", fill=NULL) +
  theme_minimal(base_size=13) + theme(legend.position="bottom")

tibble(Metric=c(paste0("LFPR ",YR1),paste0("LFPR ",YR2),paste0("LFPR ",YR3),
                paste0("LFPR ",YR4," (proj)"),paste0("Change ",YR3,"-",YR4," (pp)")),
       Value=c(total$rate_yr1,total$rate_yr2,total$rate_yr3,total$rate_yr4,total$rate_chg_34)) |>
  kable(digits=1, caption="LFPR Summary") |>
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options=c("striped","hover"), full_width=FALSE)
```

# 3 — By Gender

```{r gender}
gender <- raw |> filter(str_detect(group, "^Men|^Women|^\\s+Men|^\\s+Women"))
if (nrow(gender) > 0) {
  gender |> mutate(group=str_trim(group)) |>
    select(Group=group, !!paste0("Rate ",YR3):=rate_yr3,
           !!paste0("Rate ",YR4):=rate_yr4, `Change (pp)`=rate_chg_34) |> head(4) |>
    kable(digits=1, caption="LFPR by Gender") |>
    kable_styling(bootstrap_options=c("striped","hover"), full_width=FALSE)
}
```

---

# 4 — By Age

```{r age, fig.height=7}
age <- raw |>
  filter(str_detect(group, "^\\s*\\d+\\s+to\\s+\\d+|^\\s*55 and|^\\s*65 and|^\\s*75 and")) |>
  mutate(group=str_trim(group))
if (nrow(age) > 0) {
  age |>
    ggplot(aes(x=reorder(group,rate_yr3), y=rate_yr3)) +
    geom_segment(aes(xend=group,y=rate_yr4,yend=rate_yr3), color="gray70", linewidth=1) +
    geom_point(aes(color="Current"), size=4) +
    geom_point(aes(y=rate_yr4, color="Projected"), size=4) +
    coord_flip() +
    scale_color_manual(values=c("Current"="#2c7bb6","Projected"="#f39c12")) +
    labs(title=paste0("LFPR by Age: ",YR3," vs ",YR4), x=NULL, y="Rate (%)", color=NULL) +
    theme_minimal(base_size=12) + theme(legend.position="bottom")
}
```
